SEARCH
Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.dns

Class DNSResourceRecord

java.lang.Object
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.dns.DNSResourceRecord
public final class DNSResourceRecord extends Object
A DNS resource record.

Resource records appear in the answer, authority, and additional sections of DNS responses.

Author:
Chris Burdess

  • Constructor Details

    • DNSResourceRecord

      public DNSResourceRecord(String name, DNSType type, DNSClass dnsClass, int ttl, byte[] rdata)
      Creates a new DNS resource record.
      Parameters:
      name - the domain name
      type - the record type
      dnsClass - the record class
      ttl - time to live in seconds
      rdata - the record data

      public static DNSResourceRecord a(String name, int ttl, InetAddress address)
      Creates an A record (IPv4 address).

      name - the domain name
      ttl - time to live in seconds
      address - the IPv4 address
      Returns:
      the resource record

    • ptr

      public static DNSResourceRecord ptr(String name, int ttl, String ptrName)
      Creates a PTR record.
      Parameters:
      name - the domain name (reverse lookup name)
      ttl - time to live in seconds
      ptrName - the target domain name
      Returns:
      the resource record

    • ns

      public static DNSResourceRecord ns(String name, int ttl, String nsName)
      Creates an NS record.
      Parameters:
      name - the domain name
      ttl - time to live in seconds
      nsName - the name server hostname
      Returns:
      the resource record

    • mx

      public static DNSResourceRecord mx(String name, int ttl, int preference, String exchange)
      Creates an MX record.
      Parameters:
      name - the domain name
      ttl - time to live in seconds
      preference - the preference value (lower = higher priority)
      exchange - the mail server hostname
      Returns:
      the resource record

    • txt

      public static DNSResourceRecord txt(String name, int ttl, String text)
      Creates a TXT record.
      Parameters:
      name - the domain name
      ttl - time to live in seconds
      text - the text content
      Returns:
      the resource record

    • soa

      public static DNSResourceRecord soa(String name, int ttl, String mname, String rname, int serial, int refresh, int retry, int expire, int minimum)
      Creates an SOA record.
      Parameters:
      name - the domain name
      ttl - time to live in seconds
      mname - the primary name server
      rname - the responsible person email (@ replaced with .)
      serial - the serial number
      refresh - the refresh interval
      retry - the retry interval
      expire - the expire time
      minimum - the minimum TTL
      Returns:
      the resource record

    • getAddress

      public InetAddress getAddress()
      Interprets the RDATA as an IP address (for A or AAAA records).
      Returns:
      the IP address
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if this is not an A or AAAA record

    • getTargetName

      public String getTargetName()
      Interprets the RDATA as a domain name (for CNAME, PTR, NS records).
      Returns:
      the domain name
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if this is not a name-type record

    • getText

      public String getText()
      Interprets the RDATA as TXT record content.
      Returns:
      the text content
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if this is not a TXT record

    • getMXPreference

      public int getMXPreference()
      Returns the MX preference (for MX records).
      Returns:
      the preference value
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if this is not an MX record

    • getMXExchange

      public String getMXExchange()
      Returns the MX exchange hostname (for MX records).
      Returns:
      the mail server hostname
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if this is not an MX record
